name: Mrs.Suganthi S D
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.E  ( Electronics and Communication )  - PSG COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY, BHARATHIAR UNIVERSITY   - 1988M.C.A  -  BHARATHIAR UNIVERSITY   - 2001(Ph.D)  ( Computer Science )  - Anna University
in_brief: S.D.Suganthi is an Assistant Professor(SG) in the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences at PSG College of Technology in Coimbatore, India. She obtained her master’s degree in Computer Applications from Bharathiar University.  Her research interests include Network security, Wireless Sensor Networks.She is a member of ACM, Cryptology Research Society of India(CRSI) and Institution of Engineers.

publications.title: End to end light weight mutual authentication scheme in IoT-based healthcare environment
